QuestData.Title: Haohan's Vote V: Chief Yip-Yip
QuestData.Description: You ready for the final step of the plan?$B$BThe leader of the Kunzen hozen is a brute by the name of Chief Yip-Yip. It's said that he is nearly impervious to pain.$B$BI've injected the melons with a toxic mixture, so don't try eating them!$B$BOnce you get his attention, throw these melons onto the ground. Yip-Yip won't be able to resist a sweet striped melon.$B$BWhen he takes a bite, he'll be temporarily weakened, and you should find yourself an opening to attack.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The leader of the Kunzen hozen.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Chief Yip-Yip at Kunzen Cave to the northwest.
